verblex: 2. To become more advanced, skilful, or higher in rank over a period of time. English = progress.
3. To grow or change over a period of time into a better or more complete form. English = develop.
nomlex: 1. A change for the better. English = improvement.
2. The act or process of becoming more advanced, skilful, or higher in rank over a period of time. English = progress.
3. The process of growing or changing over a period of time into a better or more complete form. English = development.
